answers.value: Ludvweshu lwangaphandle.
B/Kulala ungavuki.
Iyayichubekisa ngobe yenta boSomcuba babe nemandla ekuchubeka nemachinga ekulwa naMswati ngobe batibona batewuncoba.
Bekungakafaneli kutsi bangamfuni, sihlalo sebukhosi besisakhe Mswati njengobe bekatalwa yiNdlovukati Tsandzile.
Kungobe batitjela kutsi Mswati akayiboni yonkhe lemihlangano lebebayibamba ngasese yekucumba phasi bukhosi.
Bekubabikela ngengoti labangahle bahlangabetane nayo ngobe loko bekwenteka bekungumhlolo lucobo lwawo.
Simo sekwetfuka nekushuba kwetintfo ngobe kubonakala kutsi kulwa naMswati angeke kube malula njengoba bacabanga.
Ingcikitsi yembango webukhosi ngobe banakaboMswati bafuna kumbulala bese batsatsa sihlalo sebukhosi.
Ngingabacwayisa ngekutsi kuhle kuvikelana nisekelane nangabe nibemndeni munye kuvimbela kutsi nehlelwe ngemashwa.

Asihambisani ngobe kuletheksthi banakaboMswati batibona bancobile, Mswati angumuntfu lebatawuvele bacedze ngaye, kodvwa esiphetfweni kubonakala Mswati ancobile ababulele bonkhe labo lebebalwisana naye.
C/Luvutfondzaba.
Yatfolana etulu kwaba ngumgici namgici, emabutfo aMtjekeni abulawa ngebunyenti.
Kukhombisa emandla labekanawo nekutsi besekaphelelwe sineke ngaloko bekwentiwa banakabo.
Ngalokutsi nangabe imphi yaMswati ibuye emphini incobile, sive saMswati besijatjuliswa ngekuhlatjelwa tinkhomo kuyiwe emphakatsi kuyodliwa bantfu batidlele labakutsandzako.
Imigadlela ngobe beyilwa ngelulaka lolukhulu, nangabe ihlasela beyenta siciniseko sekutsi iyancoba.
Yatsatsa sinyatselo sekubeka sikhulu lesisha, yabuye yaniketa bantfu tindzawo tekwakha, tekulima nekufuya.
Bekuyindlela yabo yekutivikela kutsi bangatfolakali malula ngobe besaba kubulawa ngemabutfo aMswati.
Belifuna kwenta siciniseko sekutsi alishiyi lutfo lokuphilako lokungaphindze kubabangele inkinga yekuphazamisa bukhosi ngekuhamba kwesikhatsi.
Kutifundzisa kutsi kulwela intfo longakanikwa yona kungakubulalisa njengobe sibona banakaboMswati babulawa ngemabutfo aMswati, emachinga lebebawenta angabasebenteli.
D/Wekukhatsalelana.
Inkinga yekushisa indlu yamkhulu wakhe ngeliphutsa.
Akazange amshaye nobe amcoshe ngalesikhatsi ashise indlu kepha wahamba naye kuyofuna indzawo yekulala.
Yebo aba yimphumelelo ngobe Mshumayeli wacedza kufundza phesheya wabuya wakhela gogo wakhe likhaya bahlala kamnandzi.
Kusitjela kutsi bebaphilisana kahle nebakaTsabetse ngobe akutange kubelukhuni kutsi babavumele bayewulala khona bangumndeni.
Mshumayeli uvakala ucela umsebenti wesikolo kuKhanyisile afuna kubhala noma simo sasekhaya simatima.
Sikhombisa kutisola nekuva buhlungu kutsi abasenakhaya ngenca yakhe.

Kuhlekwa ngulabanye bantfwana ngekutsi wadojwa emgcomeni/Kungayati imvelaphi yakhe/ Kungabati batali bakhe/ Kubukeka ehlukile kulabanye bantfwana/kungabi nemali yekuchuba tifundvo takhe njengobe mkhulu wakhe angasekho emhlabeni.

Khanyisile bekamtsandza ngekweliciniso Mshumayeli ngobe wakhona kumesekela ngalesikhatsi bashelwe likhaya wabuye wamlindza ngalesikhatsi ayofundza Phesheya lokuyimvelakancane emantfombataneni alomuhla.
Singafundza kutsi imfundvo iyaphumelelisana/Kuhlupheka akuhlali kukhona kuyaphela/Kuhlonipha batali bakho kuhle/Kungajahi tintfo nawusakhula kuyaphumelelisana emphilweni.

questions.marker_instruction: 2.1.8, 2.1.10: Kubili kwaloku. 2.1.9, 2.1.10: Naleminye imibono lenembako yemukelekile.

answers.value: Sibukeka singasisihle sikhomba kucasuka/kutfukutsela/nekuphelelwa sineke.
Inhloso kusitjela kutsi kweswela angeke kwema endleleni yekuchubeka netifiso takho.
Bekubangelwa kutsi wala kuyobhala ebhodini ngako-ke, bekafuna kuyomatisa imbangela yekungasukumi kwakhe, angabonakali njengemfundzi lodzelelako.
Kugcugcutela kutsi bafundzi banetinkinga lebahlangabetana nato kubalulekile kukhulumisana nabothishela ngobe kwenta bothishela bavisise timo lebaphila ngaphasi kwato.
Lendzawo beyiphephile ngobe wakhona kukhuluma tonkhe tinkinga takhe akhululekile angesabi lutfo.
Umbhali usebentise lisu letembatfo ngobe tembatfo takhe tesikolo betidzabukile.
Bafakwa eluhlelweni lwesondlo setintsandzane/Bafundza mahhala ababhadali tindleko tesikolo/batfola imifundzate/Kunetinhlangano letibatsengela tembatfo tesikolo.
Samsita ngekutsi akhone kutfola emakheli etindzawo temifundzate, wakhona kufaka ticelo tekubhadalelwa tindleko tesikolo kuleto tindzawo kute achubeke nekufundza.
Imphilo yaMshumayeli yehluke kakhulu kunemphilo lebekayiphila asafundza sikolo ngobe ugcina afundzile, aphila kahle anelikhaya lelihle angesweli lutfo kantsi asafundza bekeswele kuhlekiswa ngaye.

questions.marker_instruction: 2.2.7: Kubili kwaloku. 2.2.8, 2.2.9: Naleminye imibono lenembako yemukelekile.

answers.value: Ngiko vele nami ngifuna kushiya phasi yonkhe lentfo le!
Kubeketela umelane nesimo noma ngabe silukhuni kangakanani, ucinisele.
Badlali babili kuphela/bayacocisana/itheksthi yenteka endzaweni lococekile.
Kuyamfanela ngobe uvakala ayintfombatane lenesibindzi futsi lebuvikelako bukhosi beBatfwa kantsi uyawati nemsebenti lekumele awente njengeNdlovukati.
Kufuna kubona kutsi Tsembative uyogcinelaphi naKhetsiwe njengobe babonakala banebudlelwano kuletheksthi.
Ngulesekutsi ufuna Khetsiwe ametsembise kutsi utawuba yiNdlovukati lecotfo afukamele bukhosi beBatfwa nakungenteka yena afe.
Udlala indzima yekulwisana naye wonkhe umuntfu lokumele atsatse bukhosi ngobe afuna kutisikela incenye yakhe ebukhosini.
Kwabaphazamisa kutsi bangasakhulumi kahle ngekwenta emachinga ekuvikela sihlalo sebukhosi lobubukeka buzulelwa ngemangce.

Kubaluleke kakhulu ngobe umntfwana uvamise kulilandzela ligama lakhe. Nawubuka ligama laQedizizwe lisho umuntfu lohamba etiveni atiphazamisa. Umdlalo uwusekela ngekugcugcutela imphi nekwenta emachinga ekuvimba Vusa kuba sesibhimbini sebukhosi.

questions.marker_instruction: 3.1.3: Kubili kwaloku. 3.1.7: Naleminye imibono lenembako yemukelekile.

answers.value: C/Uyingoti.
Ungikhiphe egodzini.
Qedizizwe naTsembative bayalwa/Kunekukhulumisana kabi emkhatsini waQedizizwe naTsembative/Tsembative utsi ugwaze bacizisango lababili.
Kuphuma ngekushesha lokukhulu babalekele kubanjwa.
Kungobe kunemnyakato lomkhulu/kunekugwazana/kunembane lomanyatako/kunekudvuma kwelitulu.
Sento sekusindzisa Vusematfwa ekutfunjweni kwakhe ngobe bekangabulawa boQedizizwe kepha bekatimisele kulwa nabo.
Bekuluphawu lwesimo lesimatima nekushuba kwetintfo kanye nembango lokhona esiveni seBatfwa.
Tinkhulumo taQedizizwe timveta angumuntfu lodzelelako nalotetsemba kakhulu ngobe ukhuluma ngekutetsemba nekungababoni kutsi bayini boTsembative.

Kungobe bekatifundza kutsi akanalivi njengobe asihambi nje ebukhosini beBatfwa, kungenela tindzaba tebukhosi bekuyindlela yakhe yekutiphilisa ngetindlela letingasitinhle acabanga kutsi kungenteka atfole sikhundla lesisetulu.
Ngiyavuma ngobe Vusematfwa bekangumnakabo, kungako watsatsa lesincumo kute amphephise, lebekusincumo lebekangeke asente kunoma ngubani lekangakahlobananga naye.

questions.marker_instruction: 3.2.3, 3.2.5: Kubili kwaloku. 3.2.8, 3.2.9, 3.2.10: Naleminye imibono lenembako yemukelekile.

answers.value: B/Babili.
Intfo nje kutsi lamadvodza lamanye lesisebenta nawo ahlushwa mabele, ahlola kakhulu eludziweni.
Lokungenta ngichubeke ngifundze lendzatjana kufuna kwati kutsi ingabe tihlobo taMasiphula tavela yini ngemuva kwekungcwatjwa kwakhe.
Puntju wafaka simemetelo sekwedlula kwemufi emhlabeni emsakatweni kutsi tihlobo tive bese tiyamlandza.
Senteka epulazini lemlumbi longuPuntju lapho lamadvodza bewasebenta khona.

Ngiyavuma, bekangenato ngobe akekho lowavela wate wangcwantjwa ngumlumbi lebekasebenta kuye kantsi nasekucaleni kwendzaba kuvelile kutsi ufa akashiyi ntsandzane namfelokati ngobe wefika angumfanyana lapha kaPuntju.
Tibaveta babantfu labaneluvelo nalabamkhatsalelako lomunye umuntfu ngobe bafuna umlingani wabo Masiphula angcwatjwe ngenhlonipho.

Labatsi kuliciniso batawusekela batsi: Bantfu labanatsa tjwala ababi nayo imali ngoba lebayiholako bayicedza yonkhe etjwaleni bangakhoni kondla imindeni yabo nobe bakhokhele tintfo letibalulekile etimphilweni tabo. Labatawutsi kungumbono batawusekela batsi: Akusibo bonkhe labanatsa tjwala labafelelako nobe labangondli imindeni yabo, labanye bayayitfumela imali emakhaya babuye bafundzise bantfwababo ngalokufanele.
Sekutsi atsatse imininingwane yabo bonkhe bantfu lakabacashako ayigcine kahle ngembi kwekutsi bamsebentele.

Ngumlayeto wekutsi caphela nawenta tintfo unatsile kute utikhandzi sewenta emaphutsa longeke usawalungisa ngobe lamadvodza anatsa tjwala, agcine angcwaba umuntfu lophilako lebekungeke kusalungiseka, bagcine bababulali.
NguMagilogilo ngobe konkhe lokwenteka kulendzatjana kucondzene naye nguye lobekenta lemikhuba yekutsebula bantfu.
A/Sekutsakatsa.
Emashica nguloko lokusalako nakuhlutwa tjwala.
Ludvweshu lwangaphandle ngobe lemikhobo icasukile, ayifuni kusebenta, ilwa naMagilogilo ngobe angakayiniki kudla.
Lemikhobo beyingamvukela imshaye imlimate nemndeni wakhe njengobe ibonakala inemandla futsi seyikhombisa nekumlwisa.
Kwelulekwa ngekwengcondvo ngobe bona bebati kutsi tihlobo tabo tafa tangcwatjwa/bebangabasita bangcwabe letihlobo kabusha.
Kuyakholweka ngobe kukhona bantfu labagangako lababulala bantfu, labanye babacwiye netitfo temtimba kute emabhizinisi abo akhule.
Bewafuna kutfola bonkhe bufakazi ngaloko lokwentiwa nguMagilogilo kute batobusebentisa enkantolo bese uvalelwa sikhatsi lesidze ngemacala ekubulala ngebutsakatsi.
Bafundza kutsi akekho umuntfu longehlula bemtsetfo noma ungaba nemandla, ugange ubulale bantfu ngemitsi angeke kugcine wena, kuyogcina sandla semtsetfo.
A/Luchumanosigcino.
Isivetela kutsi sonkondlo bekasayitsandza lentfombi yakhe ngobe noma sekakulahle konkhe lokucondzene nayo usayikhumbula.
Ngumoya wenkhumbulo ngobe sonkondlo usitjela kutsi njalo nakeva lengoma ukhumbula sitsandvwa sakhe.
Lomugca usivetela kutsi sonkondlo useva buhlungu kakhulu ngalokushiywa ngulesitsandvwa sakhe.
Ingcikitsi yelutsandvo, sonkondlo ukhuluma ngelutsandvo lolungafuni kuphela lolumenta angakhoni kukhohlwa lesitsandvwa sakhe.
Bewungibuka ngawo ngibone / Likusasa lami lifanana neliZulu. (Umugca we-28 newe-29)
Lamagama asetjentiselwe kukhomba kugcizelela. (Ayimphindvwa)
Sihloko sibumbene nenkondlo ngobe sitsi, 'Leyo Ngoma' kantsi kusukela ekucaleni sonkondlo ukhuluma ngalengoma lemkhumbuta sitsandvwa sakhe lebebayidlala basatsandzana.
Sifundza kutsi sibomukela simo sinjengobe sinjalo/Ungabi sigcila selutsandvo/Ungatsandzi umuntfu ukhohlwe kutitsandza wena/ Akukho lokungapheli emhlabeni/Imphilo yakho ayingasimi kulomunye umuntfu.

questions.marker_instruction: 5.1.8, 5.1.9: Naleminye imibono lenembako yemukelekile. 5.1.9: Kutsatfu kwaloku.

answers.value: Imvumelwanosicalo/Imvumelwanosicalo yabonkhamisa.
Isathaya/Inkondlogceka ngobe sonkondlo ugceka umbulalave ngemonakalo losewudalile esiveni kusukela wefika. Uncusa Mvelinchanti kutsi asale angenelela ngobe bona sebehlulekile.
Mbulalave sal' udzela.
Sifanangwaca ngobe onkhe lamagama lakulomugca anangwaca s-.
Luchumanomkhatsini lolwecako. Lamagama lacindzetelwe ayafanana emkhatsini wemigca lengalandzelani.
Lemigca ichaza kutsi umhlaba ugcwele emathuna ebantfu, lowutsi nawuwabuka emehlo agcwale lusizi netinyembeti.
Lemigca ayilingani, emagama asuka kulamabili aye kulamatsatfu.
Sidvonsamoya ngobe nawufundza lomugca uyaphumula emkhatsini wawo.

Lenkondlo ikhuluma ngesifo sengculazi lesingakhetsi lesibulala sonkhe sive/ Utsi sililo salesifo sesivakele yonkhe indzawo emisebentini, etikhungweni temfundvo nasemakhaya/Sonkondlo uyabuta kutsi live liyakuba ngulelinjani lelinganabo bantfu lasebakhulile, emantfombatana nemajaha/Ucela Mvelinchanti kutsi angenelele ngobe yonkhe imizamo yesive seyehlulekile, konkhe sekwetfulwa kuye.
